original_title: Alvin and the Chipmunks in The Chipmunk Family Tree
overview: The Chipmunk Story. Answers the question all America has been asking. How did David Seville, a young struggling songwriter, end up living with three baby Chipmunks, Alvin, Simon and Theodore.  A Chipmunk Reunion. Is a heart-warming story that deals with adoption and adventure as Alvin, Simon and Theodore are thrust into a strange new world as they search for their long lost mother.
title: Alvin and the Chipmunks in The Chipmunk Family Tree
